text: Pierre Vassiliu (23 October 1937 - 17 August 2014) was a French singer and songwriter. He was born in Geneva, Switzerland. His first song, Qui c'est celui-l√† (1973), sold more than 300,000 copies. He once sang with The Beatles in 1964. Vassiliu died in Lyon, France, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography (in French) * Biography * Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French singers Category:French songwriters Category:People from Geneva
title: Pierre Vassiliu
